data.quote: Entertain others, one of the most exciting ways to exist.
data.author: Clarice Lispector

data.quote: Freedom is little. What I desire still has no name.
data.author: Clarice Lispector

data.quote: And what human beings most aspire to is to become a human being.
data.author: Clarice Lispector

data.quote: I spent my life trying to correct the mistakes I made in my eagerness to get it right.
data.author: Clarice Lispector

data.quote: What we truly are is what the impossible creates in us.
data.author: Clarice Lispector

data.quote: Because it is an infamy born to die, you do not know when or where.
data.author: Clarice Lispector

data.quote: What does it matter, to live or to know that one is living?
data.author: Clarice Lispector

data.quote: I'm not promiscuous. But I am kaleidoscopic: I am fascinated by my sparkling mutations that here kaleidoscopically record.
data.author: Clarice Lispector

data.quote: And if you think I am weird, respect too. Even I was forced to respect myself.
data.author: Clarice Lispector

data.quote: I'm a beating heart in the world.
data.author: Clarice Lispector

data.quote: Being born has spoiled my health.
data.author: Clarice Lispector

data.quote: Nor do I understand what I understand: for I am infinitely greater than myself, and I can not reach.
data.author: Clarice Lispector

data.quote: I have several faces. One is almost beautiful, another is almost ugly. I'm a what? Just about everything.
data.author: Clarice Lispector

data.quote: The word is my dominion over the world.
data.author: Clarice Lispector

data.quote: Do not worry about understanding. Living surpasses all understanding. Surrender as I surrendered. Dive into what you do not know as I dived.
data.author: Clarice Lispector

data.quote: Because I made love a wrong mathematical calculation: I thought that, by adding the insights, I loved. I did not know that adding misunderstandings is that you truly love yourself.
data.author: Clarice Lispector

data.quote: Missing someone is like a little hungry: only happens when you eat the presence.
data.author: Clarice Lispector

data.quote: Loving others is the only individual salvation I know: no one will be lost if they give love and sometimes receive love in return.
data.author: Clarice Lispector

data.quote: I do not have time for anything else, being happy consumes me a lot.
data.author: Clarice Lispector

data.quote: She believed in angel and because he believed they existed.
data.author: Clarice Lispector
